lead_paragraph: A federal judge allowed the defendant in the Charleston killings to bring back the legal team he fired last week for the guilt phase of his trial.

headline.print_headline: Legal Team Is Reinstated for Trial in Charleston
headline.main: Dylann Roof Wins Bid to Reinstate Lawyers in Church Massacre Trial

snippet: A federal judge allowed the defendant in the Charleston killings to bring back the legal team he fired last week for the guilt phase of his trial....
abstract: Dylann Roof wins permission to reinstate his legal team for initial guilt phase of his forthcoming trial on federal charges related to 2015 shooting spree at Emanuel African Methodist Episcopal Church in Charleston, SC, which left nine people dead.

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: Emanuel African Methodist Episcopal Church (Charleston, SC)
